name: Crypt Raider (JandroK)
description:
The Crypt Raider is a prototype for testing an idea out, in which you will have to get out of the dungeon using your wits.

The main mechanics is telekinesis, with which you can make objects float and transport them.

Controls:
-Move: AWSD
-Jump: Space
-Rotate camera : Move mouse
-Telekinesis: Left Click mouse

This is a project that I have done completing the course "Unreal 5.0 C++ Developer: Learn C++ and Make Video Games" of GameDev.tv. , using mainly C++.

I hope you enjoy!
